Address.label: Address
Address.value: NO. 18 BONHAM STRAND WEST,11TH FLOOR, BANGKOK BANK BUILDING, HONG KONG, Hong Kong

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Futu Holdings Ltd is an online broker providing one-stop online investing services. The company provides its services through its digital platform Futu NiuNiu, which includes market data, trading service, and news feed of Hong Kong, Mainland China, Singapore, and United States equity markets. It generates its revenue in the form of brokerage commission and handling charge services.
